description: Enterprise techniques used by RegDuke, ATT&CK software S0511 v1.0
name: RegDuke (S0511)

techniques.comment: [RegDuke](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0511) can extract and execute PowerShell scripts from C2 communications.(Citation: ESET Dukes October 2019)
[RegDuke](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0511) can decrypt strings with a key either stored in the Registry or hardcoded in the code.(Citation: ESET Dukes October 2019)
[RegDuke](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0511) can persist using a WMI consumer that is launched every time a process named WINWORD.EXE is started.(Citation: ESET Dukes October 2019)
[RegDuke](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0511) can download files from C2.(Citation: ESET Dukes October 2019)
[RegDuke](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0511) can store its encryption key in the Registry.(Citation: ESET Dukes October 2019)
[RegDuke](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0511) can use control-flow flattening or the commercially available .NET Reactor for obfuscation.(Citation: ESET Dukes October 2019)
[RegDuke](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0511) can hide data in images, including use of the Least Significant Bit (LSB).(Citation: ESET Dukes October 2019)
[RegDuke](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0511) can use Dropbox as its C2 server.(Citation: ESET Dukes October 2019)
